entities.name: severus snape
entities.description: Severus Snape is mentioned as the new Headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is described as a familiar, hook-nosed, black-haired man.

relationships.entity_2: hogwarts school of witchcraft and wizardry
relationships.description: Severus Snape is appointed as the new Headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.
